name: [DEMO] Hamiduki
description:
• No horror elements
  • Useful features (Flowcharts, Sound captions, SaveLock, etc.)
CHARACTERS Rikuno　(MC/Name changeable)

Calm, serious, worrier girl. A bit of a strange thought process.

Inuhiko

 Free and pushful boy. He often lunges at Kugu-san.

Ayamie(Now translating)

A boy thinks he is a contrary person. Inuhiko's younger brother.

Kugu-san(Now translating)

 A boy is full of energy. He jumped from the 3rd floor and was unharmed.

Why "unpolished English"?
  • This game is machine translated from Japanese to English.
  • Mr.DeepL and I did our best.
  • But if there is a sentence in the game that doesn't make sense, please let me know.
